data.headline: Nasdaq 100 futures fall 0.6%, leading a tech sector selloff tied to renewed AI disruption concerns
bullets: S&P 500 futures down 0.2%, Dow slightly negative, and Russell 2000 off 0.4% in cautious premarket action
Sentiment remains weak after back-to-back weekly declines and last week's broad tech-led selloff across software, logistics, real estate, trucking, and finance
Traders watching for further rotation out of tech stocks ahead of Wednesday's Fed minutes and Friday's PCE inflation report
Key earnings from DoorDash, Molson Coors, and Walmart expected later in the holiday-shortened week
